meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of chiliasm.
meanings.sent1: The chiliastic belief in a future utopia is inspiring.
meanings.sent2: Her chiliastic views on the apocalypse are well-known in the community.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his chiliastic dreams involved everyone eating endless chili.
meanings.sent4: The chiliastic vision of a perfect society seemed almost too good to be true.
meanings.sent5: The chiliastic prophecy painted a vivid picture of a world transformed.
